The flight would be long but Tucson could not help but to look back just on=
e more time.  His love for Talon grows ever stronger with each time he look=
s back to her.

Perpetually on the move and constantly busy. 

On Aug 16, 2=
011, at 1:42 PM, Airshadow Nightstar <airly2002@...> wrote:

> Talo=
n:
>  
> talon looked Tucson flew away and shen she wasnt able to see him, =
she looked at Torca and said =E2=80=9CWhat do you want I do?=E2=80=9D
>  
>=
 From: Sandy Panico
> Sent: Tuesday, August 16, 2011 11:28 AM
> To: nbwrpg@=
yahoogroups.com
> Subject: Re: Strange meetings - Finding lost friends
>  
=
> 
> 
> Tucson transforms into robot mode and kneels down beside Silverbolt=
 and Bantor.  A genitle hand is placed on their chest one by one, as he clo=
ses his eyes to allow his ears to be his primary sense.  He could sense tha=
t Bantor would recover reasonably well in CR but Silverbolt would need some=
 help.
>  
> " You're right Torca, Silverbolt is in a very bad way.  Too mu=
ch energy has been lost. He has to be flown back to the Ark right away.  Ta=
lon, Torca may need you here to keep guard over the cave.  Whoever attacked=
 the Fuzors may return to try and finish the job.  I have full faith in tha=
t you will make them think twice before attempting it. "
>  
> Before anyth=
ing else, Tucson gives Talon a tender embrace and a soft kiss on her forehe=
ad.
>  
> " No matter what happens, I will always love you."
>  
> He then =
turns to Silverbolt, kneels down and gently takes him into his arms.  Lifti=
ng him up slowly, Tucson rises back up onto his feet and turns to Torca and=
 Airhammer.
>  
> " Remain here, the cave is safe from intruders.  I will f=
ly Silverbolt back to the Ark and I will inform Stanton and Bump of your lo=
cation and the state of the other Fuzors.  Also, be sure Noctorro gets his =
rest, he needs it."
>  
> He turns to the mouth of the cave and stops to li=
sten to the activities of the skies.  He narrows a brow and looks to Silver=
bolt with a bit of a heavy heart.
>  
> " I can't waste time, I won't let y=
ou die, it's not your time."
>  
> He looks back to Torca and Airhammer.
> =
 
> " Keep safe, my friends, keep safe."
>  
> With his words he dashes out=
 of the cave, extends his wings and decides to  fly fast in robot mode, wit=
h Silverbolt in tow.
> 
> Perpetually on the move and constantly busy.
> 
>=
 On Aug 16, 2011, at 6:37 AM, Super Cyclonus <supercyclonus@...>  wro=
te:
> 
>>  
>> > <OLD>
>> >
>> > Tucson follows the beacon and scopes out a=
 place to land safely. He finds
>> > an area with even ground and makes his=
 decent.
>> >
>> > " Hold on Noctorro, I'm taking us down."
>> >
>> > Wings=
 instinctively curl inward for landing as Tucson extends front and hind
>> =
> legs out to catch the ground on all fours. With just a few wing beats he
=
>> > manages to approach land and softly slide into a graceful landing. He
=
>> > continues to follow the beacon by foot.
>> 
>> <NEW>
>> 
>> The cave i=
s easy to find with the help of the beacon. It is well
>> camoflaged, but t=
he beacon takes TUSCON right to it.
>> 
>> TORCA stepped to the entrance of=
 the cave, his thick frame covered in
>> battle scars and wounds, but he se=
emed to be fairly okay. AIRHAMMER is
>> standing over the heavily wounded f=
orms of BANTOR and SILVERBOLT as
>> they lay down in the back of the cave.
=
>> 
>> "We just got our radios working again." TORCA said without much
>> p=
reamble. "We were about to call for an evac when we got NOCTORRO's
>> call.=
 I think most of us are okay, although Bantor will need some time
>> in the=
 CR chamber."
>> 
>> TORCA pointed at SILVERBOLT, "But he got it the worst =
of it. The
>> seekers hit him with some sort of extraction device right on =
his spark
>> chamber. Bantor dove in and knocked it away, but the backlash =
damaged
>> them both."
>> 
>> AIRHAMMER nodded, "After that we drove them o=
ff, but Bantor and
>> Silverbolt were damaged." AIRHAMMER looked down at th=
em. "We don't
>> know how the damage is to Silverbolt. He has not awakened =
yet."
>> 
>> (TAG)
>> 
>> Preston
>> 
>

<html><body bgcolor=3D"#FFFFFF"><div>The flight would be long but Tucson co=
uld not help but to look back just one more time.  His love for Talon =
grows ever stronger with each time he looks back to her.<br><br>Perpetually=
 on the move and constantly busy. </div><div><br>On Aug 16, 2011, at 1=

 do?=E2=80=9D</div>

<div>Tucson transforms into =
robot mode and kneels down beside Silverbolt and 
Bantor.  A genitle h=
and is placed on their chest one by one, as he closes 
his eyes to allow hi=
s ears to be his primary sense.  He could sense that 
Bantor would rec=
over reasonably well in CR but Silverbolt would need some 
help.</div>
<div=
> </div>
<div>" You're right Torca, Silverbolt is in a very bad way.&n=
bsp; Too much 
energy has been lost. He has to be flown back to the Ark rig=
ht away.  
Talon, Torca may need you here to keep guard over the cave.=
  Whoever 
attacked the Fuzors may return to try and finish the job.&n=
bsp; I have full 
faith in that you will make them think twice before attem=
pting it. "</div>
<div> </div>
<div>Before anything else, Tucson gives=
 Talon a tender embrace and a soft kiss 
on her forehead.</div>
<div> =
</div>
<div>" No matter what happens, I will always love you."</div>
<div>&=
nbsp;</div>
<div>He then turns to Silverbolt, kneels down and gently takes =
him into his 
arms.  Lifting him up slowly, Tucson rises back up onto =
his feet and turns 
to Torca and Airhammer.</div>
<div> </div>
<div>" =
Remain here, the cave is safe from intruders.  I will fly Silverbolt 
=
back to the Ark and I will inform Stanton and Bump of your location and the=
 
state of the other Fuzors.  Also, be sure Noctorro gets his rest, he=
 needs 
it."</div>
<div> </div>
<div>He turns to the mouth of the cave=
 and stops to listen to the activities of 
the skies.  He narrows a br=
ow and looks to Silverbolt with a bit of a heavy 
heart.</div>
<div> <=
/div>
<div>" I can't waste time, I won't let you die, it's not your time."<=
/div>
<div> </div>
<div>He looks back to Torca and Airhammer.</div>
<d=
iv> </div>
<div>" Keep safe, my friends, keep safe."</div>
<div> =
</div>
<div>With his words he dashes out of the cave, extends his wings and=
 decides to 
fly fast in robot mode, with Silverbolt in tow.</div>
<div><br=
>Perpetually on the move and constantly busy. </div>
<div><br>On Aug 16, 20=
11, at 6:37 AM, Super Cyclonus <<a href=3D"mailto:supercyclonus@...=

t;NEW><br><br>The cave is easy to find with the help of the

t is well<br>camoflaged, but the beacon takes TUSCON right to

>TORCA stepped to the entrance of the cave, his thick frame covered 
  in<b=
r>battle scars and wounds, but he seemed to be fairly okay. AIRHAMMER 
  is=
<br>standing over the heavily wounded forms of BANTOR and SILVERBOLT 
  as<=
br>they lay down in the back of the cave.<br><br>"We just got our radios 
 =
 working again." TORCA said without much<br>preamble. "We were about to cal=
l 
  for an evac when we got NOCTORRO's<br>call. I think most of us are oka=
y, 
  although Bantor will need some time<br>in the CR chamber."<br><br>TOR=
CA 
  pointed at SILVERBOLT, "But he got it the worst of it. The<br>seekers=
 hit him 
  with some sort of extraction device right on his spark<br>chamb=
er. Bantor dove 
  in and knocked it away, but the backlash damaged<br>them=
 
  both."<br><br>AIRHAMMER nodded, "After that we drove them off, but Bant=

  and<br>Silverbolt were damaged." AIRHAMMER looked down at them. "We
